lines.text: For a time I thought, that maybe I was guilty, somehow. But I remain innocent. Because I'm not R! A nation cannot make me guilty.
Well, R, with such ideas you're not allowed to live.
I know, that is why I admit it. For all Rs, including you I'll courageously admit to being R and I will die now.
A dream seems real, reality seems a dream. Such things happen, don't they?
